attributes.action: Encourage all people in the United Kingdom to save Energy and the planet by making Solar panels and Wind turbines for homes Tax free
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
By giving this incentive to the people it would encourage all people to do their bit to help save this wonderful planet and help the United Kingdom hit its targets for renewable energy by 2012.

We are miles behind the USA and Europe and we should be leader of this not followers
